Document Title: Evaluating experimentation in the public sector: learning from a Brazilian innovation lab
Citation: Ferrarezi, E., Brandalise, I., & Lemos, J. (2021). Evaluating experimentation in the public sector: learning from a Brazilian innovation lab. Policy Design and Practice, 4(2), 292–308. https://doi.org/10.1080/25741292.2021.1930686
Research objective (LLM): Assess the impact and effectiveness of GNova, a Brazilian public sector innovation lab, in fostering competencies and innovation.

Document Title: Innovation labs in South American governments: Congruencies and peculiarities

Research objective (LLM): Identify and characterize innovation laboratories in South American governments, examining their roles, methodologies, and challenges.
Research method (LLM): Multiple-case study approach using documentary analysis, bibliographic research, and structured questionnaires.
Main conclusions (LLM): South American government innovation labs primarily focus on organizational innovation rather than citizen-oriented initiatives.

Categories of Topics Discussed: Public innovation overview

Document Title: Public Innovation and Living Labs in Action: A Comparative Analysis in post-New Public Management Contexts

Research objective (LLM): Analyze public innovation labs (living labs) in Spain and Brazil to understand their implementation, methodologies, and impact on governance.
Research method (LLM): Comparative case study using qualitative methods, including document analysis and semi-structured interviews.

Document Title: Policy innovation lab scholarship: past, present, and the future

Research objective (LLM): Review the evolution of policy innovation lab literature, highlighting trends, challenges, and future research directions.

Document Title: Policy labs: the next frontier of policy design and evaluation?

Research objective (LLM): Analyze the role of policy labs in improving policy design and evaluation, and explore synergies between evaluation methods and policy labs.

Document Title: Meeting expectations? Response of policy innovation labs to sustainable development goals
Citation: Esti Hoss-Golan, Anat Gofen, Adam M Wellstead, Meeting expectations? Response of policy innovation labs to sustainable development goals, Policy and Society, Volume 43, Issue 3, September 2024, Pages 334–350, https://doi.org/10.1093/polsoc/puae023

Citation: Souza, E. F. N., & Amaral, I. G. (n.d.). Gestão da inovação em serviços públicos: Uma análise do potencial de inovação dos serviços desenvolvidos em núcleos de inovação tecnológica em instituições de ensino superior do Estado do Rio Grande do Norte.

Main conclusions (LLM): Three dimensions (political and technical leadership, innovation processes, indicators/metrics) limit public service innovation. Document Title: Perfis e características das equipes e dos laboratórios de inovação no Brasil

Document Title: Inovação pública no Brasil: uma visão geral de seus tipos, resultados e indutores
Citation: Cavalcante, P., & Camões, M. R. S. (2017). Public Innovation in Brazil: an overview of its types, results and drivers. Brasília: Ipea.
Research objective (LLM): Investigar os tipos, resultados e determinantes da inovação pública no Brasil.
